short_description: kuber paper & pack is a paper & cardboard products supplier based in pitampura, india.
long_description: kuber paper & pack is a professionally managed corrugated sheets & box manufacturing company. continuing the legacy of long standing business family ethics and vast management experience, kuber paper & pack has set-up state-of-the-art plant with most contemporary machine and equipments. situated at a conveniently placed industrial belt in ncr region at sonipat, haryana kuber paper & pack is a 100% privately owned company. kuber ensures total commitment on the part of owner-managers which translates into direct tangible gains like high quality and on time delivery and intangible gains like personal attention and satisfactory customer relationship. core strengths are technical and mechanical superiority, multiple product lines, quality policy, human relation policy, business affiliations and qualified manpower with very strong focus on people before profit makes kuber stand out in the field. we are iso 9001 : 2015 certified company. business policy driven by spirit of 3cs (co-operation, collaboration, commitment), clients are encouraged to share and discuss their needs and requirements so as to secure highest efficiency and effectiveness for maximum consumer satisfaction.
